commit.message:
configure.in: Use "missing" script to generate warning if flex or bison programs not found...

* configure.in: Use "missing" script to generate warning if
flex or bison programs not found, instead of invoking "false".
* configure: Rebuilt.

From-SVN: r59735

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,9 @@
+i2002-12-02  Craig Rodrigues  <rodrigc@gcc.gnu.org>
+
+	* configure.in: Use "missing" script to generate warning if
+	flex or bison programs not found, instead of invoking "false".
+	* configure: Rebuilt.
+
 Mon Dec  2 20:28:48 CET 2002  Jan Hubicka  <jh@suse.cz>
 
 	* unroll.c (copy_loop_body): Copy CONST_OR_PURE_CALL_P.

@@ -926,7 +926,7 @@ test "$program_transform_name" = "" && program_transform_name="s,x,x,"

-echo "configure:799: checking for $ac_word" >&5
+echo "configure:930: checking for $ac_word" >&5

   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
